importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the article's update reflects the most current information available about Diane Keaton's death, which occurred on Saturday, October 12, 2025, and was confirmed by the death certificate obtained by CNN.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The timeframe of the event spans from the date of Diane Keaton's death on Saturday, October 12, 2025, to the reporting of the details by CNN on Thursday, October 16, 2025, indicating the timeline of public awareness and official confirmation.

keyTakeAways: Diane Keaton, a celebrated actress known for her Academy Award win in 'Annie Hall,' died from primary bacterial pneumonia at age 79.
The cause of death was officially listed as primary bacterial pneumonia with no other contributing conditions.
No autopsy was performed, consistent with the Los Angeles medical examiner’s typical protocol for cases deemed natural causes.
Keaton was cremated following her death.
The Los Angeles Fire Department received a call for medical assistance on Saturday morning, and paramedics transported Keaton to a hospital.
Her colleagues and friends, including filmmaker Nancy Meyers, have praised her as a fearless, talented, and humorous performer whose presence transformed their creative experiences.
Diane Keaton’s legacy includes both her on-screen achievements and her deeply personal influence on those who worked with her.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Diane Keaton, the acclaimed actress known for her Academy Award-winning role in 'Annie Hall,' died at age 79 from primary bacterial pneumonia, with no other contributing conditions. According to a death certificate obtained by CNN, she was cremated and no autopsy was performed, consistent with protocols for natural causes. The Los Angeles Fire Department responded to a medical emergency at her home on Saturday, October 12, 2025, and transported her to a hospital. Colleagues, including longtime friend and filmmaker Nancy Meyers, have praised Keaton as a fearless, humorous, and transformative presence in cinema, highlighting her enduring legacy beyond her on-screen work.
title: New Details Released About the Death of Diane Keaton
